docs.snippet: Democratic presidential front-runner Hillary Clinton said on Saturday the deadly mass shooting at a historic black church in South Carolina is a violent reminder of continued institutionalized racism in the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic presidential front-runner Hillary Clinton said on Saturday the deadly mass shooting at a historic black church in South Carolina is a violent reminder of continued institutionalized racism in the United States.

headline.main: Clinton: Race a 'Deep Fault Line' in America
headline.print_headline: Clinton: Race a 'Deep Fault Line' in America

docs.snippet: In addressing the brutality of the punishment at length in an opinion, he raises a constitutional question some colleagues might prefer to avoid....
docs.lead_paragraph: In addressing the brutality of the punishment at length in an opinion, he raises a constitutional question some colleagues might prefer to avoid.
docs.abstract: Editorial holds Supreme Court Justice Anthony Kennedy, in issuing lengthy remarks critical of solitary confinement in relation to case of California death row inmate Hector Ayala, seems eager to discuss constitutionality of brutal punishment; applauds Kennedy for appearing open to discussing subject most justices would rather avoid.

docs.snippet: Senator Graham, a South Carolina Republican and a presidential hopeful, returned to his home state Friday to do what little he could to help as residents mourned nine murdered churchgoers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Senator Graham, a South Carolina Republican and a presidential hopeful, returned to his home state Friday to do what little he could to help as residents mourned nine murdered churchgoers.
docs.abstract: South Carolina Republican and 2016 presidential hopeful Sen Lindsey Graham returns to his home state after shooting at Charleston church that left nine black parishioners dead; visits site of massacre, attends prayer vigil, gives interviews and calls family members of those killed.

headline.main: Returning Home to Console, Lindsey Graham Joins the Mourning
headline.print_headline: Returning Home to Console, a Presidential Hopeful Joins the Mourning

keywords.value: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Charleston, SC)

docs.snippet: Before he found himself at the center of the St. Louis Cardinals’ hacking scandal, Luhnow rose through the ranks of baseball on the strength of his technological prowess....
docs.lead_paragraph: Before he found himself at the center of the St. Louis Cardinals’ hacking scandal, Luhnow rose through the ranks of baseball on the strength of his technological prowess.
docs.abstract: Houston Astros general manager Jeff Luhnow, whose proprietary database was presumably hacked into by his former team St Louis Cardinals, was inspired by analytical approach to baseball when he read book Moneyball.

headline.main: Astros’ G.M. Jeff Luhnow Delegates With a Drive for Data
headline.print_headline: Astros’ G.M. Delegates With a Drive for Data

docs.snippet: Inside the Islamic State's realm, the paper testifying that you have "repented" from your heretical past must be carried at all times. Many people laminate it just to be safe. It can mean the difference between life and death....
